ovdesc.p: Refers to the Common Test Base on which scripts are regressed

desc.p: Any valid description that describes the Test Base.

The ID format has two parts of the type, RNN.AAYY, where RNN indicates the T24 release (e.g. R09, R10, R11 etc), AA indicates description mnemonic (say ST for Single company Trade Date), YY indicates variant of test base with different static (e.g. 01). R09.ST01 indicates a test base in T24 Release R09, Single Company Trade Dated set up, first variant. R09.ST02 will be a similar Static Base, but with another variant in one of the static set up records.
